channel.title: Startup error
channel.description:
Hey, I recently launched my Old client and I get this error after DLing the cache: [code]RadicalPkZ java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 60136 at Model.method460(Model.java:49) at client.preloadModels(client.java:906) at client.startUp(client.java:8183) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5584) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60 [/code]
I had it fixed, but I lost the client due to a computer crash. Anyone know the fix? Thanks.

item.title: Startup error
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

Hey, I recently launched my Old client and I get this error after DLing the cache:

I had it fixed, but I lost the client due to a computer crash. Anyone know the fix? Thanks.
